class RpgHero:

ã“ã“ã§ã¾ãŸéºä¼ç ”ã«æˆ»ã‚Šã€bedtools ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ F_\text{st} ã®é«˜ã„é ˜åŸŸã¨ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ©ãƒƒãƒ—ã™ã‚‹éºä¼å­ã‚’ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆã™ã‚‹ã€‚

awk -F'\t' '$5 > 0.3' shamo_vs_other.windowed.weir.fst > shamo_vs_other.03.fst

.fst ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®5åˆ—ç›® ($5) ãŒ WEIGHTED_FST ãªã®ã§ã€ã“ã‚ŒãŒ 0.3 ã‚ˆã‚Šå¤§ãã„è¡Œã‚’æŠ½å‡ºã™ã‚‹ã€‚ ã“ã®ä½œæ¥­è‡ªä½“ã¯ã‚¨ã‚¯ã‚»ãƒ«ã§ã‚„ã£ã¦ã‚‚ R ã§ã‚„ã£ã¦ã‚‚ã„ã„ã€‚

NCBI ã‹ã‚‰ bGalGal1.mat.broiler.GRCg7b ã® GTF ã‚’ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã™ã‚‹:

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/genome/GCF_016699485.2/ ã¸
Download ã‹ã‚‰ Annotation features (GTF) ã®ã¿é¸æŠã—ã¦ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰
æ‰‹å…ƒã«å–å¾—ã—ãŸ genomic.gtf ã‚’éºä¼ç ”ã«é€ã‚‹

ã“ã®ã¾ã¾ä½¿ã£ã¦ã‚‚ã„ã„ã‘ã©ã€9åˆ—ç›®ã® Attribute ã®æƒ…å ±ãŒå¤šã™ãã‚‹ã€‚ ä»Šå›ã¯éºä¼å­ID (gene_id) ã•ãˆã‚ã‚Œã°ã„ã„ã®ã§ã€ã“ã“ã ã‘æ®‹ã—ãŸã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ãª GFF ã«å¤‰ãˆã¦ãŠã:


clean_gtf.py

import argparse


def main():
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
    parser.add_argument("-i", "--infile")
    parser.add_argument("-o", "--outfile")
    args = parser.parse_args()

    gtf = clean_gtf(args.infile)
    with open(args.outfile, "w") as f:
        for l in gtf:
            f.write("\t".join(l)+"\n")


def clean_gtf(gtf):
    new_lines = []
    with open(gtf) as f:
        for l in f:
            if l[0] == "#":
                new_lines.append([l.rstrip("\n")])
            else:
                l = l.rstrip("\n").split("\t")
                l[-1] = extract_gene_from_gtf(l[-1])
                new_lines.append(l)
    return new_lines


def extract_gene_from_gtf(desc):
    descs = desc.split("; ")
    descs = {i.split(" ")[0]: i.split(" ")[1].strip('"') for i in descs if " " in i}
    gene = descs.get("gene_id", "NA")
    return gene


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

ãƒãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—è§£æ
æŠ½å‡ºã—ãŸ ISPD å‘¨è¾ºé ˜åŸŸã® VCF ã‚’æ‰‹å…ƒã«ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã—ã¦ã€ R ã§èª­ã¿è¾¼ã‚€ã€‚ å…¨é ˜åŸŸã‚’å¯è¦–åŒ–ã™ã‚‹ã¨ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆãŒæ¨ªã«æ½°ã‚Œã‚‹ã®ã§ã€F_\text{st} ãŒç‰¹ã«é«˜ã„é ˜åŸŸã«çµã£ã¦ãŠã:

library(conflicted)
library(tidyverse)

ispd_vcf = readr::read_tsv("ISPD.recode.vcf", comment = "##") |>  # ã‚‚ã—ãã¯ ISPD.snpEff.vcf

    dplyr::starts_with("bam/"),
    names_to = "sample",
    values_to = "genotype"
  ) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    POS = as.character(POS),
    sample = stringr::str_split(sample, "/", simplify = TRUE)[,2],
    genotype = stringr::str_replace(genotype, ":.+", ""),
    FORMAT = "GT",
    category = dplyr::if_else(stringr::str_detect(sample, "SM|YKD"), 1, 0),
    sample = forcats::fct_reorder(sample, category)

\Delta Allele frequency ã®è¨ˆç®—ã¨å¯è¦–åŒ–
è»é¶ã¨ãã®ä»–å“ç¨®ã®ã‚¢ãƒªãƒ«é »åº¦ã®å·®ã‚’è¨ˆç®—ã™ã‚‹ã€‚ ã“ã“ã¯ VCF ã®å½¢å¼ã«ã‚ˆã£ã¦æ–¹æ³•ãŒç•°ãªã‚‹ã€‚ ä»Šå›ã¯ bcftools mpileup | bcftools call --ploidy 2 ã§ãƒãƒªã‚¢ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã—ãŸå½¢å¼ã‚’æƒ³å®šã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚
ã“ã®å ´åˆã€ã‚ã‚‹ã‚¢ãƒªãƒ«ã®éºä¼å­å‹ãŒ2æœ¬ã¨ã‚‚ Reference ã¨åŒã˜ (REF/REF) ã§ã‚ã‚Œã° 0/0ã€ ãƒ˜ãƒ†ãƒ­ã§ SNP ã‚’æŒã¤å ´åˆ (REF/ALT) 0/1ã€ãƒ›ãƒ¢ã§æŒã¤å ´åˆ (ALT/ALT) 1/1 ã¨ãªã‚‹ã€‚
ALT éºä¼å­å‹ã®ã‚¢ãƒªãƒ«é »åº¦ã‚’ã€0/0 = 0, 0/1 = 0.5, 1/1 = 1 ã¨ã—ã¦ãã®å¹³å‡ã‚’ã¨ã£ã¦è¨ˆç®—ã™ã‚‹:

ispd_af = ispd_vcf |>
  dplyr::select(POS, sample, genotype, category) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    AF = dplyr::case_when(
      genotype == "1/1" ~ 0,
      genotype == "0/1" ~ 0.5,
      .default = 1),
    category = dplyr::if_else(category == 1, "Shamo_AF", "Other_AF")

  dplyr::group_by(POS, category) |>
  dplyr::summarise(mean_AF = mean(AF)) |>
  tidyr::pivot_wider(names_from = category, values_from = mean_AF) |>
  dplyr::mutate(diff_AF = abs(Shamo_AF - Other_AF))

  labs(x = "POS", y = "delta allele frequency") +  # xè»¸, yè»¸ã®ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒˆãƒ«
  theme_classic() +                                # ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ãªãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã§
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_blank(),                 # xè»¸ã®ãƒ©ãƒ™ãƒ«ã¯ãªãã™
    axis.ticks.x = element_blank()                 # xè»¸ã® ticks ã‚‚ãªãã™
  )



ãƒãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ—ã®ãƒ’ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒãƒƒãƒ—æç”»
ç¶šã„ã¦ã€å„å“ç¨®ã®éºä¼å­å‹ã‚’ãƒ’ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒãƒƒãƒ—å½¢å¼ã§å¯è¦–åŒ–ã™ã‚‹ã€‚

  )

module Precious
  class App < Sinatra::Base
    use Rack::Auth::Basic, 'Private Wiki' do |username, password|
      users = File.open(File.expand_path('users.json', __dir__)) do |file|
        JSON.parse(file.read, symbolize_names: true)
      end
      name = username.to_sym
      digested = Digest::SHA256.hexdigest(password)
      if users.key?(name) && digested == users[name][:password]
        Precious::App.set(:author, users[name])
      end
    end

    before do
      session['gollum.author'] = settings.author
    end
  end
end

GO ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒªãƒƒãƒãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆè§£æã¨åŒæ§˜ã«ã€ èˆˆå‘³ã®ã‚ã‚‹éºä¼å­/ãªã„éºä¼å­ã§åŒºåˆ‡ã‚‹è§£æ (over-representation) ã¨ã€ ãªã‚“ã‚‰ã‹ã®ã‚¹ã‚³ã‚¢ã«åŸºã¥ã„ã¦ã‚½ãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ãŸæ™‚ã«ä¸Šä½ã«æ¿ƒç¸®ã™ã‚‹ãƒ‘ã‚¹ã‚¦ã‚§ã‚¤ã‚’èª¿ã¹ã‚‹è§£æ (gene set enrichment) ãŒã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚

Github ã§ ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶å.github.io ã¨ã„ã†åã®ãƒªãƒã‚¸ãƒˆãƒªã‚’ä½œæˆ
ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã«ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã‚’æ§‹ç¯‰ã—ã¦ git init:

Actions ã®è¨­å®š
git push ã‚’ãƒˆãƒªã‚¬ãƒ¼ã«ã€è‡ªå‹•ã§ãƒ“ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ã‚’èµ°ã‚‰ã›ã¦ gh-pages ãƒ–ãƒ©ãƒ³ãƒã«ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã« Actions ã‚’è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹ã€‚

.github/workflows/gh-pages.yml

name: GitHub Pages

on:
    push:
        branches:
            - main  # Set a branch name to trigger deployment
    pull_request:

jobs:
    deploy:
        runs-on: ubuntu-22.04
        steps:
            - uses: actions/checkout@v3
                with:
                    submodules: true  # Fetch Hugo themes (true OR recursive)
                    fetch-depth: 0    # Fetch all history for .GitInfo and .Lastmod

            - name: Setup Hugo
                uses: peaceiris/actions-hugo@v2
                with:
                    hugo-version: 'latest'

            - name: Build
                run: hugo

            - name: Deploy
                uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3
                # If you're changing the branch from main,
                # also change the `main` in `refs/heads/main`
                # below accordingly.
                if: ${{ github.ref == 'refs/heads/main' }}
                with:
                    github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
                    publish_dir: ./public

åŸºæœ¬çš„ãªä½¿ã„æ–¹
import argparse

parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()

parser.add_argument("-o", "--output")   # ãƒã‚¤ãƒ•ãƒ³1ã¤ã®çœç•¥å½¢ã‚‚è¿½åŠ ã§ãã‚‹

parser.add_argument("arg2", help="ï¼’ã¤ç›®ã®ãƒã‚¸ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³å¼•æ•°")  # --helpã—ãŸã¨ãã®èª¬æ˜ã‚’æ›¸ã„ã¦ãŠã‘ã‚‹

def get_node_ids(tree, names: list[str]) -> list[int]:
  node_ids = [ leaf.node_id for leaf in tree if leaf.name in names ]
  return node_ids

def get_mrca_node_ids(tree, names: list[str]) -> list[int]:
  node_ids = [ get_node(tree, name) for name in names ]

def get_omega(tree, model):
  """
  b_free ã‹ã‚‰ Ï‰ ã‚’å–å¾—ã™ã‚‹ã®ã‚‚ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒ‰ã„ã®ã§é–¢æ•°æ›¸ã„ã¡ã‚ƒã†
  """
  mark2omega = {}
  result = tree.get_evol_model(model)
  for attr in result.branches.values():
    mark = attr.get('mark')
    omega = attr.get('w')
    mark2omega[mark] = omega
  return mark2omega

if pval < 0.05:
  wfgb = get_omega(tree, "b_free")[" #1"]
  wbgb = get_omega(tree, "b_free")[" #0"]
  print("Foreground branches evolving at omega value of %s significantly diferent from %s.' % (wfrg, wbkg)")
else:
  print("Model b_neut is not rejected.")
